import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-offers-section', templateUrl: './offers-section.component.html', styleUrls: ['./offers-section.component.scss'] }) export class OffersSectionComponent { public bulletPoints: {icon: String, text: String}[] = [{ icon:"checkmark.svg", text:"Point1" }, { icon:"checkmark.svg", text:"Point1" }, { icon:"checkmark.svg", text:"Point2" }, { icon:"checkmark.svg", text:"Point3" }, { icon:"cross.svg", text:"Point4" }, ]; constructor(){ } }
